original_text: And all spoke well of him and marveled at the gracious words that were coming from his mouth. And they said, “Is not this Joseph's son?”
korean_text: 그들이 다 그를 증언하고 그 입으로 나오는 바 은혜로운 말을 놀랍게 여겨 이르되 이 사람이 요셉의 아들이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: And all spoke well of him
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 그에 대해 좋게 말했으며

sentences.original_text: and marveled at the gracious words
that were coming from his mouth.
